channel.title: Fucked up ubuntu workspace
channel.description: My Workspaces are too wide, and stuff keeps opening on the far right side and I can't reach it. How can I make them smaller?

item.title: Fucked up ubuntu workspace
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:386264”][quote author=n10si t link=topic=482020.msg3530108#msg3530108 date=1300095194]
My Workspaces are too wide,
[/quote]
Sounds to me like you got a odd video card driver. Try adjusting your resolution, or uninstalling the driver.[/quote]

Idk what happened, but when I woke up this morning they were fine. My bot ran all night and idk how they got fixed but they did lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Fucked up ubuntu workspace
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

n10si t:

My Workspaces are too wide,

Sounds to me like you got a odd video card driver. Try adjusting your resolution, or uninstalling the driver.

Read full topic
